name: A World in Strife 2: Absolute Order
summary:
Strife: Absolute Order is a six-level PWAD for Strife that uses the ZDoom source port and was released in November 2012. It was made by Adam Woodmansey (Khorus) and uses a mixture of his own custom music plus a remix of a music track made by Sarah Mancuso (esselfortium). 
 
Absolute Order received one of the 2012 Cacowards.
